author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Announcement Teaser Trailer for Son of Thanjai, an upcoming cinematic action-adventure game developed by Ayelet Studio. Players will set out on an adventure set in 11th-century South India as a Chola King with responsibilities on his shoulders. Dispatch enemies in visceral combat and rise as a legend in Son of Thanjai, coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#gamescom2025
title: Son of Thanjai - Official Announcement Teaser Trailer (English Subtitles) | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
There is one clear evolution here over previous Anno games. Anno 1800 and the futuristic Anno 2205 treated your colonies as secondary concerns—settlements whose purpose was to support your primary metropolis. In Anno 117: Pax Romana, building settlements in Latium and Albion will be equally involved. We played some of the latter campaign to compare it to our previous hands-on time with the former. Previewed by Rick Lane

#IGN #Gaming
title: Anno 117: Pax Romana - Albion Preview

author: IGN
description:
Bender is rampaging out of control! A volcano is about to explode! Fry confronts a rival for Leela's love! And Dr. Zoidberg is rising up to heaven?! The excitement might be too much! You've been warned. Check out the Futurama: Season 13 trailer for the sci-fi animated comedy series for a peek at the adventures that await Fry (voiced by Billy West), Bender (John DiMaggio), Leela (Katey Sagal), and the rest of the crew in the new season. Season 13 of Futurama arrives on Hulu September 15 at 8PM ET with all 10 episodes. New episodes will premiere on FXX September 15 at 8PM with two episodes weekly.

Futurama is created by Matt Groening and developed by Groening and David X. Cohen. Executive Producers include Groening, Cohen, Ken Keeler and Claudia Katz.

While delivering pizza on New Year's Eve 1999, Philip J. Fry is accidentally cryonically frozen and thawed out one thousand years into the future. From the creator of "The Simpsons," "Futurama" is a sci-fi animated comedy.
title: Futurama: Season 13 - Official Trailer (2025) Billy West, John DiMaggio, Katey Sagal

author: IGN
description:
A magical and beautifully animated journey through time, Arco is a dazzling adventure about a 10-year-old boy from a peaceful, distant future who accidentally travels back to the year 2075 and discovers a world in peril. As Arco develops a charming and touching friendship with a young girl named Iris, they band together and along with her trusted robot caretaker Mikki, set out on a quest to get Arco home, while the two children may also be the only ones who can save our planet. A wondrous odyssey filled with hope and optimism for our future, Arco is an enchanting fable from breakout filmmaker Ugo Bienvenu, produced by Remembers’ Bienvenu and Felix de Givry, and mountainA’s Natalie Portman and Sophie Mas.

#IGN #Movies
title: ARCO - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Will Ferrell, America Ferrera, Natalie Portman

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Sony has joined the console price-raising bandwagon and hiked the MSRP of the PlayStation 5, PlayStation 5 Digital Edition, and the PlayStation 5 Pro—each by $50. The PS5 will now cost $549, the PS5 Digital is $499, and the PS5 Pro is $749. Sony has not announced a specific reason for the price hike, only citing a 'challenging economic environment.' Prices for accessories have not changed. In other news, a new Halloween video game has been announced by Illfonic, the makers of the Friday the 13th and Killer Klowns from Outer Space games. This new title will be made in collaboration with John Carpenter, and has a 2026 release window.

Presented by Universal Orlando Resort and its new theme park, Universal Epic Universe.

#IGN
title: PlayStation 5 Prices Have Gone Up in the U.S. - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Reveal Trailer for Gear.Club Unlimited 3, an upcoming installment to the racing game franchise developed by Eden Games. Players will hit the streets of the Mediterranean coast, scenic roads of Japan, and more with a suite of different cars to race in and customize. Gear.Club Unlimited 3 is coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Gear.Club Unlimited 3 - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Build a city on the back of a Space Whale and learn to coexist as you journey through the stars. Get a new look at gameplay from Beyond These Stars in this latest trailer for the upcoming strategy city-builder game. In Beyond These Stars, manage intricate supply chains and the needs of your people as you build outposts, meet aliens, and uncover the mysteries of the universe.

#gamescom2025
title: Beyond These Stars - Official Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out gameplay from WILL: Follow The Light for this upcoming adventure game. The new WILL: Follow The Light trailer shows environments you'll explore, which hide pieces of Will's past, along with new puzzles and traversal challenges. WILL: Follow The Light will be available on PC (Steam), Xbox Series X/S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5). Playtest registration is available now.

#ign #gaming
title: Will: Follow the Light - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Gameplay Trailer for Edge of Memories, an anime action-adventure RPG developed by Midgar Studio. Players will embody Eline, a nomad, alongside her allies to engage in deep action combat as the world of Avaris hangs on the brink of extinction. Edge of Memories is coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: Edge of Memories - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a peek at the Schism faction coming to Heroes of Might and Magic: Olden Era in this latest teaser trailer for the upcoming turn-based strategy game prequel. In Heroes of Might and Magic: Olden Era, explore the map solo or in multiplayer, triumph in iconic battles and establish peace on a continent where it was never an option. Heroes of Might and Magic: Olden Era will be available on PC via Steam.

#ign #gaming
title: Heroes of Might and Magic: Olden Era - Official Schism Faction Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Gameplay Trailer for Den of Wolves, a co-op first-person heist shooter developed by 10 Chambers. Players will embody true criminals for hire to compete against other crews backed by corporations to execute the perfect heist and reign victorious. Den of Wolves is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#ign #gaming
title: Den of Wolves - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Pre-Alpha Trailer for God Save Birmingham, an upcoming open-world survival crafting game developed by Ocean Drive Studio. Players will do what's necessary to survive a deadly plague by gathering resources, making use of the game's physics-based mechanics, and more to save Birmingham. God Save Birmingham is coming soon to PC (Steam), with sign-ups for the pre-alpha test available now.

#ign #gaming
title: God Save Birmingham - Official Pre-Alpha Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Reveal Trailer for Lunar Strike, an upcoming sci-fi exploration adventure game developed by Cognition. Players will set out to the moon on humanity's last mission to preserve records of their very existence before the moon's eventual collapse and destruction. Race against time in Lunar Strike, coming soon to PC (Steam).

#ign #gaming
title: Lunar Strike - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 13 Minutes of Prologue Gameplay for Directive 8020, an upcoming sci-fi narrative-driven horror adventure game developed by Supermassive Games. Players will make key dialogue choices with a suite of characters and scenarios that will alter the course of the game's story. In this 13-minute slice of gameplay, players will join Carter and Simms as they step outside the Cassiopeia ship to tackle a dangerous hull breach that could threaten the mission. Directive 8020 is launching in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#gamescom2025
title: Directive 8020 - Official 13 Minutes of Prologue Gameplay | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into the gameplay of Warhammer 40,000 Mechanicus 2 in this latest trailer for the upcoming turn-based tactical game sequel. Learn about the new additions to Warhammer 40,000 Mechanicus 2, including a fully playable campaign from both The Adeptus Mechanicus and the Necron side, as well as new features, units, biomes, weapons, and gameplay. Warhammer 40,000 Mechanicus 2 will be available on Windows PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S.

the new additions to the critically acclaimed original such as a fully playable campaign from both The Adeptus Mechanicus and the Necron side, as well as new features, units, biomes and weapons, shown with all-new footage and gameplay.

#ign #gaming
title: Warhammer 40,000 Mechanicus 2 - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
World of Warcraft's executive producer Holly Longdale and senior game director Ion Hazzikostas give us an in-depth look at the new Midnight expansion, which is finally adding a much-requested feature – housing for players. Find out how it works, plus get your first look at new features coming to Midnight and the story of the fight between the forces of the Light and the Void.

World of Warcraft: Midnight will be coming to PC in 2026.

#ign #gamescom2025
title: World of Warcraft is Finally Getting Player Housing, Here's How it Works | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
The action in Battlestar Galactica: Scattered Hopes brings to mind FTL, perhaps the greatest of all space-faring roguelikes. It oscillates between white-knuckle tension when the Cylons demonstrate their incredible force, but much of your time in this game will be oddly dulcet. Previewed by Jeremy Smith

#IGN #Gaming
title: Battlestar Galactica: Scattered Hopes Aims to Deliver an FTL-Like Roguelike

author: IGN
description:
Matty and Mikey from Squanch Games walk us through the story and gameplay of High on Life 2. High on Life 2 comes to Xbox and PC on Feb. 13, 2026. This video was originally produced by Xbox @ gamescom 2025: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P45cJ2HdFh4

#gamescom2025
title: High on Life 2 - Gameplay Breakdown and Developer Interview | Xbox @ gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
The hugely popular city-building series heads to Rome for its eighth installment. Albion is the second province to be revealed and game director Jan Dungel discusses why they chose ancient Britannia as the setting, how economics will continue to play a key part in the game, and reveals some of the challenges you'll face trying to build Rome in a day (well, maybe a little longer).

Anno 117: Pax Romana is coming to PC, PlayStation and Xbox on November 13, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: How Anno 117: Pax Romana Brings Britannia to Life | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
World's Edge Principal Lead Producer Savannah Harrison and Principal Design Director Christopher Rubyor walk us through gameplay details from Age of Empires IV: Dynasties of the East DLC, which comes to Xbox and PC on November 4. This video was originally produced by Xbox @ gamescom 2025: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P45cJ2HdFh4

description:
Game Director Radosław Ratusznik walks us through more details, and gameplay, of Valor Mortis, the upcoming first-person action soulslike from the creators of Ghostrunner. Valor Mortis comes to Xbox Series consoles and PC in 2026. 

This video was originally produced by Xbox @ gamescom 2025: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P45cJ2HdFh4

author: IGN
description:
Meet the new heroines: Sorcerer, Black Arrow, Shadowstrix, Mercenary, Seer, and the Seer's new path: The Blasphemer, along with the camp and new questline coming to Mistfall Hunter's Beta 3. Check out the latest Mistfall Hunter trailer for the upcoming dark fantasy action extraction RPG where you can team up with up to three Gyldhunters and venture into the Gyldenmist to battle monstrous foes and rival teams for powerful gear. 

Rally at the camp, face the twisted might of General Harald, and step into the Gyldenmist when Mistfall Hunter's Beta 3 arrives in September 2025. Sign-up for Mistfall Hunter's Beta 3 is available now via the game's official website. Mistfall Hunter will be available on PC and Xbox Series X/S.

This video was originally produced by Xbox @ gamescom 2025: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lu6R8W91lM8

#gamescom2025
title: Mistfall Hunter - Official BETA 3 Announcement Trailer | Xbox @ gamescom 2025

description:

description:
Kirby Air Riders is basically the next big game from Smash Bros. creator Masahiro Sakurai. So how does it look, feel, and play? Let's break it down from the show floor of the biggest gaming convention in the world.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Launch Trailer for Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater, a remake of the classic tactical action espionage game developed by Virtuos Games and Konami. Players will embody Snake in an epic mission after The Boss sets a betrayal in motion by siding with the Russians. Explore dense jungles and take on a rogue's gallery of villains from The Fury to The End. Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater is launching on August 28 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

This video was originally produced by Xbox @ gamescom 2025: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lu6R8W91lM8

author: IGN
description:
Developers from Undercoders walk us through the Japanese inspiration put into Denshattack, along with the character design, levels, and more! Denshattack! comes to Xbox and PC in Spring 2026. 

This video was originally produced by Xbox @ gamescom 2025: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P45cJ2HdFh4

#IGN #Xbox #gamescom2025

author: IGN
description:
2025 is a big year for FPS games - we're getting a brand new Battlefield and a fresh Call of Duty within the space of a few weeks. But who will win in the showdown between Black Ops 7 and Battlefield 6? We weigh up the strengths and struggles faced by each franchise's next entry. Whoever wins... well, we also win, too. 

Battlefield 6 launches on October 10 on PC, PS5 and Xbox Series X/S, and Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 will be released on November 14 for PC, PS5, PS4, Xbox One and Xbox Series X/S. We saw the most recent BLOPS 7 trailer at Gamescom 2025's Opening Night Live, which offered a deeper look at a campaign that will be much, much weirder than Battlefield 6's grounded, tactical approach.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Call of Duty vs. Battlefield 6 - Who Will Win 2025's Big Shooter Showdown? | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Valor Mortis was one of the most exciting announcements at this year's Opening Night Live, but how does this self-proclaimed 'first-person soulslike' even work? Find out in this show floor interview with Radosław Ratusznik, Game Director from One More Level as he discusses how the Valor Mortis combat and parrying works, whether or not there are iframes, what to expect from the game's Metroidvania level design and much more. If you've been excited by the Valor Mortis announcement trailer, make sure you watch this video to find out the latest Valor Mortis news!

Valor Mortis will release sometime in 2026. The Valor Mortis closed beta launches in a couple of weeks.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Valor Mortis is a First-Person Soulslike - How Does That Work? | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Season 18 Quick Play Trailer for Overwatch 2, the hit team-based hero shooter developed by Blizzard Entertainment. Players can get the rundown on the changes being made to Quick Play with Season 18, such as shorter match times, quicker Item economy, backfill support, and Cross Play. A new game mode is also being added to Stadium with Payload Race, 3 new maps, and the new Draft Mode, and more, alongside the new Support Hero with Wuyang. Season 18 is launching on August 26 for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

This video was originally produced by Xbox @ gamescom 2025: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lu6R8W91lM8

#IGN #Xbox #gamescom2025
title: Overwatch 2 - Official Season 18 Quick Play Trailer | Xbox @ gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Join the IGN gang at gamescom 2025 as they react to the latest release date trailer for Hollow Knight: Silksong. From Hollow Knight: Silksong gameplay, enemies and bosses, combat mechanics, traversal, and its map--there's so much to dissect. Hollow Knight: Silksong is launching September 4 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

Presented by Borderlands 4.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Hollow Knight Silksong Release Date Trailer Reaction | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
See who can deliver their payload first in the new Payload Race mode, draft heroes, play new hero Wuyang, and enjoy new perks for every hero. Also, was that Joker from Persona 5?! The new The Stadium Quickplay Season 18 update comes to Overwatch 2 on August 26. 

This video was originally produced by Xbox @ gamescom 2025: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P45cJ2HdFh4

#IGN #Xbox #gamescom2025
title: Overwatch 2 - Stadium Quickplay Season 18 Trailer and Interview | Xbox @ gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
A rebellious young boy, Ne Zha, is feared by the gods and born to mortal parents with wild, uncontrolled powers. Now he's faced with an ancient force intent on destroying humanity, he must grow up to become the hero the world needs.

Experience the global phenomenon in theaters and in IMAX on August 22. The English language voice cast includes Academy Award winner Michelle Yeoh, Vincent Rodriguez III, Aleks Le, Damien Haas, and Crystal Lee. Directed by Jiao Zi.

Ne Zha 2 is the highest-grossing animated film of all time.
title: Ne Zha 2 - Exclusive Clip (2025) Michelle Yeoh, Aleks Le, Damien Haas

author: IGN
description:
From the creators of Deadly Premonition and No More Heroes, you are a marshal possessed by the soul of a murderer. Can you make it out of Hotel Barcelona alive, even with assassins checked into every room? Hotel Barcelona comes to Xbox Series X/S, Xbox PC, and Xbox Cloud, Steam, and PS5 on September 26. 

This video was originally produced by Xbox @ gamescom 2025: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P45cJ2HdFh4

#IGN #Xbox #gamescom2025
title: Hotel Barcelona - Official Release Date Trailer | Xbox @ gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Elemental Kin' Wuyang Hero Trailer for Overwatch 2, the hit action team-based hero shooter developed by Blizzard Entertainment. Players can get the backstory on the new hero coming to the fold with Wuyang alongside his sister Anran. With water and fire abilities being wielded by Wuyang and Anran, respectively, see how a sparring match between siblings turns into a heartfelt moment as both brother and sister get invited to join Overwatch. Wuyang is launching into Overwatch 2 for Season 18 on August 26 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

This video was originally produced by Xbox @ gamescom 2025: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P45cJ2HdFh4

#IGN #Xbox #gamescom2025
title: Overwatch 2 - Official 'Elemental Kin' Wuyang Hero Trailer | Xbox @ gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Keeper is Double Fine’s latest video game, and in case you were afraid the studio behind Psychonauts and Brutal Legend and Broken Age were suddenly going to make boring, normal games, don’t worry. This one’s about a lighthouse, which has become ambulatory for unclear reasons and seemingly befriended some bird. Double Fine head honcho Tim Schafer stopped by gamescom studio to *ahem* shed some light on this new project, explain what the gameplay loop is like, what’s going on in this weird world, and reflect on the studio’s legacy as it celebrates 25 years of making cool, weird, funny video games like Stacking, Headlander and Rad. 

Keeper will be hitting PC and Xbox Series X and S on October 17th 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Keeper: How Psychonauts 2 Paved The Way For a Game About a Lighthouse | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
The developers walk us through a match of HEAT. Customize your tank, use powerful abilities, and embrace the future of tank-based warfare in World of Tanks: HEAT, coming to Xbox and PC. 

This video was originally produced by Xbox @ gamescom 2025: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P45cJ2HdFh4

#IGN #Xbox #gamescom2025
title: World of Tanks: HEAT - Developer Interview and Gameplay Breakdown | Xbox @ gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Since its reveal over four years ago, the hype train for Replaced has continued to gather speed. Now, as we get to see even more of this super-slick side-scroller, Igor Gritsay, co-founder of Sad Cat Studios, goes into detail about the game's inspirations, what to expect from the gameplay and how the combat riffs on the Batman Arkham games.

Replaced is coming to Xbox and PC.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Replaced Looks Like One of the Most Stylish 2D Games Ever Made | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Upgrade Batman's legendary equipment, fight your way through missions inspired by Batman films, and much more in LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight coming to Xbox and PC in 2026. 

This video was originally produced by Xbox @ gamescom 2025: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P45cJ2HdFh4

#IGN #Xbox #gamescom2025
title: LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight - Developer Interview and Breakdown | Xbox @ gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Reach a summit never climbed before. Cairn's new trailer showcases the survival-climbing game's free solo mode. Watch the latest Cairn trailer for this upcoming survival-climber game from the creators of Furi and Haven. The Cairn trailer highlights what you can expect from the free solo mode, which features no rope, one life, and an extremely deadly challenge. Cairn will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC via Steam. A demo for Cairn is available now.

In Cairn, climb anywhere and plan your route carefully, managing pitons and resources to survive unforgiving Mount Kami. Discover what Aava is willing to sacrifice to achieve the ascent of a lifetime.

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Cairn - Official Free Solo Mode Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Ride an ostrich around town, dress up your cat in a frog costume, customize your character, hit the arcade, and live a charming farming life in Starsand Island. Watch the latest Starsand Island trailer for this upcoming RPG farming and life sim to see all of these activities and more. Starsand Island will be available on Xbox Series X/S, Xbox on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Steam in 2026.

Leave the hustle of the city behind and embrace life on Starsand Island. Fish, farm, raise animals, and befriend or fall in love with locals to learn their secrets. Customize your world with our DIY system, and invite friends to help build your dream paradise!

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Starsand Island - Official Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Bye Sweet Carole gets a new trailer and a release date announcement. Watch the latest Bye Sweet Carole trailer for this upcoming narrative-horror game inspired by classic animation movies. Step into a world where fairy tales turn dark and get a peek at unsettling creatures that await on your adventure. 
Bye Sweet Carole will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch, and PC on October 9, 2025.

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Bye Sweet Carole - Official Release Date Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Satisfactory gets a new trailer and a console release date announcement. Watch the latest Satisfactory trailer for this first-person open-world factory building game with a dash of exploration and combat. Play alone or with friends, explore an alien planet, create multi-story factories, and enter conveyor belt heaven. 
Satisfactory will be available on Xbox Series X/S and PlayStation 5 (PS5) on November 4, 2025. Satisfactory is also already available on PC.

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Satisfactory - Official Console Release Date Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Deadpool is well known for both his potty mouth and his love for violence, but how do the actions of the most X-rated Marvel character translate into VR and just how violent does the game get? Find out in this interview the game's Lead Designer, Therien as he talks about Easter Eggs, cool kills, weird weapons, comfort settings, and the vocal talents of Neil Patrick Harris! 

Marvel's Deadpool VR releases November 18 for Meta Quest 3 and 3S.

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Is Deadpool VR the most violent VR game so far? | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Mortal Kombat Mythologies: Sub-Zero and Mortal Kombat: Special Forces are the final two games coming to this epic "killection." Mortal Kombat: Legacy Kollection comes soon to PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and Steam.

This video was originally produced by Xbox @ gamescom 2025: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P45cJ2HdFh4

description:
The developers of Onimusha take us through the Gamescom demo, culminating in the boss fight against Sasaki Ganryu. Onimusha: Way of the Sword, which comes to Xbox Series X/S, PC, and more in 2026.

description:
Craft your own park in Jurassic World Evolution 3, including the Cretaceous Cruise. The cruise, and every other completely safe* attraction, come to Xbox Series X/S, PC, and more on October 21.

#IGN #Xbox #gamescom2025

author: IGN
description:
LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight is the most ambitious LEGO game yet, drawing inspiration from Batman across movies, comics and even other games. Jonathan Smith, Head of Development Team at TT Games, reveals some of the DC stories that feature in the game, the heroes and villains we can expect to see and how involved DCEU overlord James Gunn is with the project.

LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight is coming to PlayStation, Xbox, PC and Nintendo Switch 2 in 2026.

IGN's gamescom 2025 coverage is presented by Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 - Legacy of the Forge.

#ign #gamescom2025
title: LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight is the Caped Crusader's Greatest Hits | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Invincible VS made a bloody big splash when it was revealed earlier this year. Now executive producer Mike Willette and combat designer Reepal 'Rip' Parbhoo go into more detail about the highly anticipated 3v3 fighter, discussing how it connects with the TV show and teasing some of the other fighters we might see when the game releases.

Invincible VS is coming to PlayStation, Xbox and PC in 2026.

#gamescom2025
title: Invincible VS: What New Characters Can We Expect? | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Gameplay Release Date Trailer for Hollow Knight: Silksong, an upcoming sequel to the hit 2D platforming Metroidvania action game developed by Team Cherry. Embark on a new adventure in the Hollow Knight franchise with the highly anticipated look of Hollow Knight: Silksong. Traverse through dark corridors, attain upgrades, and fight dangerous enemies and bosses alike to progress. Hollow Knight: Silksong is launching September 4 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong - Official Release Date Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
A mute little thing with borrowed magic. A house that murmurs back. Ask wrong, and you might wake something that remembers your name. Enter the surreal world of Carimara: Beneath the Forlorn Limbs in this new trailer for the upcoming creepy horror sim fairytale game. 
Carimara will be available on PC via Steam on October 6, 2025.

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Carimara - Official Release Date Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'A Lantern in the Night' Gamescom 2025 Trailer for Genshin Impact, the hit action RPG developed by HoYoverse. Players will be able to get a first look at Flins, an upcoming character releasing in the next annual expansion for the title. More information on the release of Flins is coming soon for Genshin Impact, available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, iOS, Android, and PC (Epic Games Store).

#GenshinImpact #gamescom2025 #Gaming
title: Genshin Impact - Official 'A Lantern in the Night' Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss 'The Case of the Sweet Scent Incident' Trailer for Pokemon Legends: Z-A, an upcoming action RPG installment to the Pokemon franchise developed by Game Freak. Take a spooky look at two Pokemon Trainers who get wind of rumors about a mysteriously sweet scent coming from a certain building. Chaos ensues in the latest trailer for Pokemon Legends: Z-A, launching on October 16 for Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2.

#PokemonLegendsZA #Gaming #IGN
title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A - Official 'The Case of the Sweet Scent Incident' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
With Tears of the Kingdom-style sky islands and a world that's begging to be explored in a number of ways, Crimson Desert's Lybee Park and Will Powers reveal some of the things players can expect to see in the sumptuous continent of Pywel, as well as detail its protagonist, traversal, and explain why it doesn't use Black Desert Online's character creator.

Crimson Desert is coming to PlayStation, Xbox and PC in 2026.

IGN's gamescom 2025 coverage is presented by Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 - Legacy of the Forge

#ign #gamescom2025
title: Why You Should be Excited About Crimson Desert's Open World | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Tune in for a special announcement about Hollow Knight: Silksong!
Thursday 21st August | 7:30 AM PT | 10:30 AM ET | 3:30 PM BST | 4:30 PM CEST

#IGN #silksong #hollowknight  #gamescom2025 #gamescom
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong - Special Announcement with Live Reactions

author: IGN
description:
Hollow Knight: Silksong is currently the most wishlisted game on Steam, but is it actually fun to play? We tried out two levels from the Hollow Knight Silksong demo at gamescom 2025, Moss Grotto and Deep Docks. One was easy one and one was very challenging but does Silksong live up to the hype and what changes can you expect now that you're controlling a Hornet instead of a Knight? Find out in this Hollow Knight: Silksong preview from the show floor!

IGN's gamescom 2025 coverage is presented by Borderlands 4.
#silksong #hollowknight #gamescom2025 #ign
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong - We've Played It! | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Hollow Knight: Silksong is actually real and playable at gamescom 2025, but what if you're in a bind and not able to attend? We've got 10 minutes worth of Hollow Knight Silksong gameplay from across the two playable levels in the Silksong demo, Moss Grotto and Deep Docks. See a Hollow Knight Silksong boss fight against the Moss Mother, and watch as the Hunter, aka Hornet, explores the maze-like levels in this Hollow Knight: Silksong off-screen gameplay!

#hollowknight #silksong #ign #gamescom2025
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Gameplay (Off-Screen) | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss this Borderlands 4 RTX 5090 gameplay, running at 4K 60FPS! In this Gamescom 2025 demo, we played as Vex, a Level 20 Siren Vault Hunter, on a mission to blast through the Primordial Vault: Fadefields mission. From an assortment of crazy weapons, cool abilities like being able to summon Reaper and Specter minions, plus an intense Primordial Guardian Inceptus boss fight gameplay at the end of the dungeon. This gameplay was captured on max settings, at 4K, with an NVIDIA 5090 RTX GPU.

#borderlands4 #ign #gamescom2025
title: Borderlands 4 Gameplay (RTX 5090, 4K 60FPS)

author: IGN
description: We exited our session with Denshattack! excited to actually play it for ourselves, and grateful that there are still studios out there that aren’t afraid to go for the gonzo, the weird, the silly, and the ambitious. In this case, a studio crazy enough to say, “Hey, what if a train could do a kickflip?” As it turns out, that answer could be pretty rad.
title: Denshattack! Might Be a Killer Blend of Tony Hawk and Jet Set Radio

author: IGN
description:
Dreamgirls and Beauty and the Beast director Bill Condon returns to the movie musical in this dazzling Technicolor-hued fantasy. Valentín (Diego Luna), a political prisoner, shares a cell with Molina (Tonatiuh), a window dresser convicted of public indecency. The two form an unlikely bond as Molina recounts the plot of a Hollywood musical starring his favorite silver screen diva, Ingrid Luna (Jennifer Lopez). Based on the Tony Award-winning Broadway musical hit.

#IGN
title: Kiss of the Spider Woman - Official Trailer #2 (2025) Jennifer Lopez, Diego Luna, Tonatiuh

description:
Don't miss the Double Down Update Trailer for Hyper Light Breaker, an open-world action-adventure game developed by Heart Machine. Players can now access the new Double Down Update, packed with a new Crown, enemies, content, features, gameplay updates, and more. The Double Down Update for Hyper Light Breaker is available now for PC (Steam).
